programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o granule.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 2 instr 1 ; k1 linseg 0,0.5,1,(p3-p2-1),1,0.5,0 a1 granule p4*k1,p5,p6,p7,p8,p9,p10,p11,p12,p13,p14,p15,\ p16,p17,p18,p19,p20,p21,p22,p23,p24 a2 granule p4*k1,p5,p6,p7,p8,p9,p10,p11,p12,p13,p14,p15,\ p16,p17,p18,p19, p20+0.17,p21,p22,p23,p24 outs a1,a2 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; f statement read sound file mary.wav in the SFDIR ; directory into f-table 1 f1 0 262144 1 "mary.wav" 0 0 0 i1 0 10 2000 64 0.5 0 0 1 4 0 0.005 5 0.01 50 0.02 50 30 30 0.39 \ 1 1.42 0.29 2 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
